metadata.title: Nikos One
metadata.summary: The integratable shopping cart and order processing platform.
metadata.longSummary:
The integratable shopping cart and order processing platform.
Seamlessly integrate shopping cart functionality to your existing business back-end and customer front-end. Connect external systems (e.g. your ERP and CRM or a database) to retrieve catalog or user data or to process customer orders. Add the shopping cart functionality to new or existing websites, enterprise applications or mobile apps.
Nikos One is very flexible and easy to configure. Add required functionality through a fine-grained plug-ins system to ensure optimal fit to your requirements.
Nikos One can be installed on-premise and on Windows Azure or other hosted servers. It supports complex server-farm and load-balancing configurations but can simply run in one web site on one server as well.
